name: Server Side Request Forgery
description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) can occur when an API fetches a remote resource without validating the user-supplied URL. This enables an attacker to coerce the application to send a crafted request to an unexpected destination, even when protected by a firewall or a VPN.

qualityRules.name: Quality Rules in numeric ID order
